name: Mephitis

Eyes: Pain from over exertion; blur; unable to distinguish letters; conjunctiva red; eyes hot and painful
Respiratory: Violent spasmodic cough; worse at night
Sudden contraction of glottis, when drinking or talking
Asthma, as if inhaling sulphur; cough from talking; hollow, deep, with rawness, hoarseness, and pains through chest
Few paroxysms in day-time, but many at night; with vomiting after eating
Sleep: Vivid dream of water, fire, etc.
Awakes at night with rush of blood to lower legs
Mouth: Coppery taste, as after eating onions
Painful jerks in root of teeth

details: A great medicine for WHOOPING-COUGH. In order to insure its full success, it should be given in the lower dilutions from 1x to 3X. Suffocative feeling, asthmatic paroxysms, spasmodic cough; cough so violent, seems as if each spell would terminate life. Child must be raised up, gets blue in face, cannot exhale. Mucous rales through upper part of chest. Patient wants to bathe in ice-cold water.
dosage: First to third potency. Has a very short action.
